msg_change_type.title: Are you sure?
msg_change_type.text: If you change your evidence type now, you will lose the special content of your evidence's focus.

msg_phase_unlocked.title: Phase unlocked!
msg_phase_unlocked.text: Congratulations, you just unlocked a phase! You can keep working on this phase, but you can also take a look on the next one.

msg_delete_evidence.title: Are you sure?
msg_delete_evidence.text: You will not be able to recover your evidence.

msg_error_delete.title: Error!
msg_error_delete.text: Sorry, your evidence could not be deleted.

msg_delete_comment.title: Are you sure?
msg_delete_comment.text: You will not be able to recover your evidence.

msg_remove_group_member.title: Are you sure?
msg_remove_group_member.text: This user will no longer be part of your group.

msg_meber_removed.title: Done!
msg_meber_removed.text: The user has been removed from your group.

msg_error_remove.title: Error
msg_error_remove.text: Sorry, this user could not be removed.
